full_output.summary: Dedicated IT professional with history of meeting company goals utilizing consistent and organized practices. Skilled in working under pressure and adapting to new situations and challenges to best enhance the organizational brand. Proven skills in completing black box testing , functional , Non-functional , Sanity , Regression , Re-testing tests. Background writing and implementing test cases, developing testing plans and identifying use cases. Fully versed in complete SDLC and STLC.

projects.name: HL Private Capital Solutions System
projects.description: Understood and analyzed the customer requirements. Designed and executed test cases according to functional specifications. Logged defect in Jira. Involved in test Report. Performed Functionality Testing, Retesting and Regression Testing. Send daily status Report to test lead. Involved in analyzing the requirements and communicating with BA team for better understanding of the requirements. Participated in scrum meeting and sprint planning meeting. Responsible for test deliverables, prioritizes and monitors activities to meet such dates for assigned features. Identified Test Cases and Test Data. Writing effective and optimized Test Cases using Black Box Testing techniques. Execution of test cases.

experiences.description: 1.4 years of experience in software testing as a software quality analyst. Documented testing procedures for developers and future testing use. It is operated under Agile and Scrum frameworks to complete releases and well-organized sprints.
